title: The Last Day of the Spring Sale
author: VD
content_html:
There are still a few copies of ETHICS and POLITICS left on the final day of the Castalia Library Spring Sale.

They may be of interest considering the book we have announced for the MAY-JUNE Library subscription book.

Thanks to everyone who made it such a successful sale. We anticipate making a major announcement concerning Library production this week.

DISCUSS ON SG
